pr_title: Rename the IS_PUMPKIN_PREDICATE field to IS_GOLEM_HEAD_PREDICATE

timeline.message: Rename the IS_PUMPKIN_PREDICATE field to IS_GOLEM_HEAD_PREDICATE

timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: We might need to open up an issue for consistency: IS_AIR_PREDICATE, IS_FOOD, DOOR_BREAK_DIFFICULTY_CHECKER, BLOW_UP_FILTER, PREDICATE, and RIDERS.
replies.author: haykam821

replies.bodyText: Hope you can create the issue since you have access to the content of your comment while i don't. though personally i'd favor CHECKER/FILTER suffixes
replies.author: liach
